snippet.title: One Piece: Unlimited World Red - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Namco Bandai Games is bringing One Piece: Unlimited World Red to the Americas in 2014 on the PlayStation 3, Nintendo 3DS, and digitally on the PlayStation Vita and Wii U!

*Nintendo 3DS and PlayStation Vita will feature local multiplayer gameplay for up to four players. Wii U and PlayStation 3 will feature split screen multiplayer gameplay for up to two players.

Stay tuned to our official channels for more updates!
https://www.facebook.com/NamcoBandai
https://twitter.com/namcogames/
http://www.namcobandaigames.com/
